product_name: Outdoor Research Essence Duo T-Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's two-tone Outdoor Research Essence Duo T-Shirt has all the comfort of your favorite tee wrapped in a performance fabric. It's ideal for base-layer performance or worn by itself. Dri-release(R) blends polyester and merino wool for superb moisture management properties and cottonlike comfort; no static cling, either. Freshguard(R) treatment embedded in the yarn virtually eliminates odor and won't wash out. Raglan sleeves offer non-irritating, seamless comfort at the shoulders and allow freedom of movement. Shoulder seams are moved forward, reducing bulk at the top of the shoulders for non-chafing comfort under backpack straps. Essence Duo T-Shirt features 2 colors of fabric and is semifitted to enhance performance. Machine wash cold, tumble dry low; do not bleach. Closeout.
short_description: The women's two-tone Outdoor Research Essence Duo T-Shirt has all the comfort of your favorite tee wrapped in a performance fabric. It's ideal for base-layer performance or worn by itself.
